Ben Simmons has moved a step closer to his first Olympics for Australia after being named in a 24-man squad in preparation for this years Tokyo Games.

articles.title: Latrell Mitchell linked to Brisbane Broncos as star rejects Rabbitohs' extension - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Star's management approaches NRL rivals
articles.content:
After declining a a $2.4 million contract extension with South Sydney, it's been revealed Latrell Mitchell's management has held talks about a move to Brisbane.
